posts.post_content: $75.00 delivered. New York residents must add sales tax. Payment via Zelle to [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] or by check/money order to: Ed Hans; Po Box 307; Buffalo, NY 14207. Please confirm via email to above address. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations, requests for additional information, etc.  Please visit my website below. Thank you for looking.
